official_title: To require the Secretary of Education to investigate the feasibility of establishing a National Environmental Science and Policy Academy.

summary.text: Environmental Defense Act of 1996 - Directs the Secretary of Education to investigate, and report to the Congress on, the feasibility of the Federal Government's establishing a National Environmental Science and Policy Academy.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of Education to investigate the feasibility of establishing a National Environmental Science and Policy Academy.
